comment: So today is National Coming Out Day. It's been over years since I first came out to anyone, and it was the most nerve-racking thing I've ever done. I would rather present my Master's thesis presentation for continuous hours than re-live that moment. (Anyway, here I am in a Pride-colored Eagles tank top after a killer sunburn from a day out on Sebago.)
amr:

I would rather present my Master's thesis presentation for continuous hours than re-live that moment. (Anyway, here I am in a Pride-colored Eagles tank top after a killer sunburn from a day out on Sebago.)

                              :unit (h2 / hour))

            :ARG2 (l / live-01
                  :ARG0 ii2
                  :ARG1 (m5 / moment
                        :mod (t5 / that))))
      :snt4 (w2 / wear-01
            :ARG0 (ii3 / i)
            :ARG1 (t6 / tank
                  :ARG1-of (c3 / color-01
                        :ARG2 (p4 / pride)))

comment: Coming out allows you to be who you are, with no fronts or worries about micro-nuanced behavior. Coming out allows you to be honest with your friends, and let them know that you trust them with everything. And coming out enables you to be a representative of the LGBT (and all other identities, of course) community.
amr:
# ::snt Coming out allows you to be who you are, with no fronts or worries about micro-nuanced behavior. Coming out allows you to be honest with your friends, and let them know that you trust them with everything. And coming out enables you to be a representative of the LGBT (and all other identities, of course) community.
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (a / allow-01
            :ARG0 (c / come-out-09)
            :ARG1 (p / person
                  :domain (y / you)
                  :ARG0-of (h / have-03
                        :polarity -
                        :ARG1 (o / or
                              :op1 (f / front)
                              :op2 (w / worry-02
                                    :ARG0 (b / behave-01
                                          :ARG1-of (n / nuance-01
                                                :mod (m2 / micro)))
                                    :ARG1 y)))))
      :snt2 (a2 / and
            :op2 (a3 / allow-01
                  :ARG0 (c2 / come-out-09)
                  :ARG1 (a4 / and
                        :op1 (h2 / honest-01
                              :ARG0 (y2 / you)
                              :ARG2 (p2 / person
                                    :ARG0-of (h3 / have-rel-role-91
                                          :ARG1 y2
                                          :ARG2 (f2 / friend))))
                        :op2 (l / let-know-07
                              :ARG0 y2

                                    :ARG0 y2
                                    :ARG1 p2
                                    :ARG2 (e / everything))))))
      :snt3 (a5 / and

                  :ARG0 (c3 / come-out-09)

                        :ARG0 (y3 / you)

                              :op1 (c4 / community
                                    :mod (l2 / lesbian))
                              :op2 (c5 / community
                                    :mod (o2 / other
                                          :mod (a7 / all)))))
                  :ARG2 y3)))

comment: After the intelligent and thought-out words presented, you chose to show unnecessary hate and ignorance in response. Keep it moving.
amr:
# ::snt After the intelligent and thought-out words presented, you chose to show unnecessary hate and ignorance in response. Keep it moving.

      :snt1 (c / choose-01

            :ARG1 (s / show-01
                  :ARG0 y
                  :ARG1 (a / and
                        :op1 (h / hate-01)
                        :op2 (ii / ignorance)
                        :ARG1-of (n / need-01
                              :polarity -))
                  :ARG2-of (r / respond-01))
            :time (a2 / after
                  :op1 (p / present-01
                        :ARG1 (w / word
                              :ARG1-of (ii2 / intelligent-01)
                              :ARG1-of (t / think-out-03)))))
      :snt2 (k / keep-02
            :mode imperative
            :ARG0 y
            :ARG1 (m2 / move-01
                  :ARG1 (ii3 / it))))

comment: It's so easy to be kind to a proud person and ignore meanness.
